body.p: To create an Oxygen Publishing Template, simply visit the galleries and pick styling aspects. Various different types of styles can be selected (such as fonts, tables, lists, spacing, code) and all changes can be seen in the Preview pane. You can also click the See Results button to generate a preview of either PDF or WebHelp output.

After creating your custom style, you can Download the current template, then back in Oxygen, click Choose Custom Publishing Template and select the downloaded archive in the transformation dialog to apply it.
At any time you can Upload a previously generated template for further customization.
